channel.title: CVE Feed for Maciej Bis -- Permalink Manager Lite
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Maciej Bis -- Permalink Manager Lite

item.title: CVE-2022-41781|2024-09-17T00:40:28.663Z -- maciej%20bis -- permalink%20manager%20lite
item.description: Broken Access Control vulnerability in Permalink Manager Lite plugin <= 2.2.20 on WordPress.

item.title: CVE-2024-37257|2024-08-02T03:50:55.531Z -- maciej%20bis -- permalink%20manager%20lite
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Maciej Bis Permalink Manager Lite allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects Permalink Manager Lite: from n/a through 2.4.3.3.
